snippet.title: En Garde! - Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1654660/En_Garde 
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/FireplaceGames 
Visit the game's website: https://engarde-game.com

Play the demo now on Steam! 
En Garde! is a swashbuckler action game. Battle graceless guards and nefarious noblemen in fast-paced fights full of spectacle. Use the environment, your wit and your blade to teach them all a lesson!

En Garde! will be available on Steam in August 2023. 
Published and Developed by Fireplace Games: https://fireplace-games.com/
